key.name: css-sheet
key.description: Path to a custom CSS file for styling the launcher interface. If empty, the default stylesheet will be used. See github for the default stylesheet.

key.name: auto-hide
key.description: If true, BobDock will automatically hide when not in use.

key.name: gtk-layer-shell-edge
key.description: Specify which edge to use for the Layer Shell component.

key.name: apps
key.description: List of application desktop IDs to be shown in BobDock.

key.name: folders
key.description: List of folder URIs to be shown in BobDock.

key.name: icon-size-range
key.description: Icons will be scaled between these two pixel sizes. Must be between 16 and 512
